nodes.text: Zoraida Córdova is the author of the short story "You Owe Me a Ride," which was published as part of the 2017 anthology From a Certain Point of View, and the young-adult novel A Crash of Fate, which was released on August 6, 2019 and serves as a tie-in to the Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge theme park. Córdova adapted the Star Wars: The Clone Wars episode "Bounty" in The Clone Wars: Stories of Light and Dark.
She is the author of the Vicious Deep trilogy, the On the Verge series, and the Brooklyn Brujas series. Córdova is based in New York and is a self-described believer in magic.
